title: Best of The Herd: 12/04/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/04/2018
description:
Colin thinks Aaron Rodgers having Josh McDaniels as his head coach would be a disaster. He thinks the biggest winner of the Urban Meyer retirement is Jim Harbaugh, but the biggest loser is the Big Ten. Plus, Rams LT Andrew Whitworth comes in studio and talks about the impact of Sean McVay on the team and differences between playing for him and his college coach Nick Saban. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
